inputs.name: taurusArguments
inputs.label: Taurus Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files or websites to test. Can be one or more Taurus YAML definition files, JMeter files or website URLs.

inputs.name: jmeterHome
inputs.label: JMeter Home
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory in which JMeter is installed. Use "$(JMeterInstaller.JMeterHome)" to reference the output of the JMeter tool installer task.

inputs.name: jmeterPath
inputs.label: JMeter Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location in which the JMeter executable is installed. Use "$(JMeterInstaller.JMeterPath)" to reference the output of the JMeter tool installer task.

inputs.name: jmeterVersion
inputs.label: JMeter Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The installed JMeter version. Use "$(JMeterInstaller.JMeterVersion)" to reference the output of the JMeter tool installer task.

inputs.name: outputDir
inputs.label: Artifacts output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Taurus and JMeter output directory. Will contain a "report" directory with an HTML report, and a "TEST-Taurus.xml" file with a report in JUnit format.

inputs.name: uploadReport
inputs.label: Upload report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to upload JMeter report to the build logs.
